struct.name: AsyncActionProgress
struct.description: Records the progress of an asynchronous action.

structMember.name: actionName
structMember.description: Name of the invoked asynchronous action.

structMember.name: additionalInfo
structMember.description: Used for logging significant messages during execution of an action.

structMember.name: progressInfo
structMember.description: Textual information that describes the actual state of the action execution.

structMember.name: progressPercentage
structMember.description: Progress of the action. The range is between 0 and 100.

structMember.name: result
structMember.description: Result state of a completed action. This field has value NOT_AVAILABLE if the action is not finished.

structMember.name: resultInfo
structMember.description: Textual description of the outcome/result of the action containing useful information for the NMS. If the action failed, it can contain an error message.

structMember.name: actionId
structMember.description: Uniquely identifies the invocation of an action. Identifies the invocation of an action when the managed object allows invocation of more than one action at a time.

structMember.name: timeActionStarted
structMember.description: Date and time when the current action was started.

structMember.name: timeActionCompleted
structMember.description: Date and time when the action was completed (successfully or unsuccessfully).

structMember.name: timeOfLastStatusUpdate
structMember.description: Date and time when the struct member state was last updated.

struct.name: LmCapacityValue
struct.description:
Defines a capacity value.
The value is invalid if the value of noLimit is 'true'. If the value of 'value' is -1 the capacity key is of type 'Not Contractually Limited'

structMember.name: value
structMember.description:
The capacity value.
The value is invalid if "noLimit=true".

structMember.name: noLimit
structMember.description: True if the value is unlimited, false if the value is defined by attribute "value".

enum.name: LmLicenseState
enum.description: The license state of a resource.

enumMember.name: DISABLED
enumMember.description: There is no valid license available for the feature or capacity.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: There is valid license available for the feature or capacity.

enum.name: LmFeatureState
enum.description: Indicates whether or not a certain feature is administratively activated.

enum.name: LmActivationState
enum.description: Operational modes activation states and License Manager grace period.

enumMember.name: INACTIVE
enumMember.description: The operational mode or grace period is inactive.

enumMember.name: ACTIVATED
enumMember.description: The operational mode or grace period is activated.

enumMember.name: ACTIVATED_EXPIRING
enumMember.description: The operational mode or grace period is about to expire.

enumMember.name: EXPIRED
enumMember.description:
The operational mode or grace period has expired.
Note: The state is not applicable to all operational modes.

enum.name: LmServiceState
enum.description: Whether a certain service is operable or not based on license and feature states.

enumMember.name: CANCELLING
enumMember.description: Cancellation is in progress.

enumMember.name: RUNNING
enumMember.description: The execution of the action is currently in progress.

enumMember.name: FINISHED
enumMember.description: The action is finished.

enumMember.name: CANCELLED
enumMember.description: The action has been cancelled and cancellation has been done.

enum.name: LmState
enum.description: Operational modes of the License Manager.

enumMember.name: LOCKED
enumMember.description: No key file is available for the License Manager, so license requests are rejected.

enumMember.name: NORMAL
enumMember.description: Key file is available for the License Manager, so license requests are granted accordingly.

enumMember.name: INTEGRATION_UNLOCK
enumMember.description:
All license requests are granted until first key file is delivered.
The maximum duration the License Manager can function in this operational mode is pre-defined. When maximum duration expires and no other unlock applies, the License Manager goes into LOCKED operational state.

enumMember.name: MAINTENANCE_UNLOCK
enumMember.description:
All license requests are granted for maintenance purposes.
The maximum duration the License Manager can function in this operational state is pre-defined. When maximum duration expires and no other unlock applies, the License Manager goes into LOCKED operational state.

enumMember.name: EMERGENCY_UNLOCK
enumMember.description:
All license requests are granted due to an emergency situation.
The maximum duration the License Manager can function in this operational state is pre-defined. When maximum duration expires and no other unlock applies, the License Manager goes into LOCKED operational state.

enumMember.name: AUTONOMOUS_MODE
enumMember.description:
The key file is not accessible and license requests are granted based on cached license information.
The maximum duration the License Manager can function in this operational state is pre-defined. When maximum duration expires and no unlock state applies, the License Manager goes into LOCKED operational state.

enumMember.name: SYSTEM_TRIGGERED_UNLOCK
enumMember.description:
SYSTEM_TRIGGERED_UNLOCK.
All license requests are granted due to unlock state being triggered by some event in the License Manager.
The maximum duration the License Manager can function in this operational state is pre-defined.

enum.name: ActionResultType
enum.description: Lists the different results of an action.

enumMember.name: SUCCESS
enumMember.description: The asynchronous action ended with success.

enumMember.name: FAILURE
enumMember.description: The asynchronous action ended with failure.

enumMember.name: NOT_AVAILABLE
enumMember.description: No result is available yet.

derivedDataType.name: DateTime
derivedDataType.description:
Represents the international standard for the representation of date and time ( ISO 8601). The string format is "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ" (excluding quotes). A DateTime string consists of a date part, a time part, and an optional time zone information part. The time zone part may be a "Z", representing the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone (equals to +00) or a time zone offset (for example, +02:00). If the time zone part is not present, the DateTime value represents local time.
The following pattern describes the DateTime format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[.S+][Z|+-hh:mm] Where: YYYY = Four digit year MM = Two digit month (01=January, and so on) DD = Two digit day of month (01 through 31) T = Time designator (shows start of time component) hh = Two digits of hour (00 through 23, AM/PM not allowed) mm = Two digits of minute (00 through 59) ss = Two digits of second (00 through 59, leap second not allowed) S+ = One or more digits of decimal fraction of a second Z = Time is UTC +- = + or - character indicating positive or negative offset to UTC
DateTime values are compliant with ISO 8601 "Representation of dates and times" but are restricted according to RFC 3339 "Date and Time on the Internet: Timestamps". The DateTime format is further restricted as follows: - T and Z designators are upper case. - . (dot) is used to indicate start of fractions of seconds (ISO 8601 also allows comma)

derivedDataType.name: ActionInvocationResult
derivedDataType.description: This is the datatype for the Asychronous Action Id.

derivedDataType.name: EcimPasswordString
derivedDataType.description: This type enables secure handling of passwords.

class.name: Lm
class.description: Supports activities and contains information related to license management.

action.name: refreshLicenseInventory
action.description:
Initiates the synchronization of Managed Element's license inventory.
Return value is true if the synchronization succeeded, otherwise false.

attribute.name: lmId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: fingerprint
attribute.description: The unique identification of the Managed Element.

attribute.name: fingerprintUpdateable
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not the fingerprint of the Managed Element can be updated.

attribute.name: lmState
attribute.description: The current operational state of the License Manager.

attribute.name: lastInventoryChange
attribute.description:
Date and time of the last change in the license inventory.
Change in the license inventory may occur when the key file is updated on the Managed Element or when license information is refreshed by synchronizing with license servers.

attribute.name: lastLicenseInventoryRefresh
attribute.description: Date and time when License Manager last synchronized the license inventory of the Managed Element.

attribute.name: referenceToLicenseServer
attribute.description:
Reference to the primary license server used by the License Manager.
For instance, the reference can contain the IP address of the server or locate its configuration interface. The attribute value is NULL if the License Manager does not rely on any license server.

class.name: FeatureKey
class.description: Key of a licensed feature that is available for the Managed Element.

attribute.name: featureKeyId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: state
attribute.description: State information for the feature associated with this key.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the feature represented by the key.

attribute.name: validFrom
attribute.description: The date and time from which the key is valid.

attribute.name: expiration
attribute.description:
The key expiry date and time.
For perpetual keys, the value is NULL.

attribute.name: shared
attribute.description:
Indicates whether the key is shared among Managed Elements or dedicated to the Managed Element.
A key is dedicated to the Managed Element if the key can be used only by the Managed Element. This is always the case when the ELIM format is used. A key can be shared among multiple Managed Elements if it is installed on a License Server to which multiple Managed Elements connect.

attribute.name: keyId
attribute.description:
Identity of the feature under license control.
E.g., CXC4011234, FAT1021234

attribute.name: productType
attribute.description:
Identifier of the type of product to which the capacity is related.
This attribute is used only in systems where the different applications use separate key files to identify which application or product the capacity belongs to, e.g. “SASN”, “GSN_GGSN”, “SSR 8000”.

class.name: CapacityKey
class.description: Key of a licensed capacity that is available for the Managed Element.

attribute.name: capacityKeyId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: licensedCapacityLimit
attribute.description: Licensed capacity limit as defined in the installed key file.

attribute.name: capacityUnit
attribute.description: The licensed capacity measuring unit.

attribute.name: grantedCapacityLevel
attribute.description:
The capacity level currently granted by the License Manager.
The attribute value is based on requests and releases of capacity units made by License Users. If such requests and releases are not made by License Users, the value of the attribute defaults to the licensed capacity limit. Note: The value of the attribute is not based on Performance Management data.

attribute.name: licensedCapacityLimitReached
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not current capacity usage reaches the licensed capacity limit.

attribute.name: state
attribute.description: State information for the capacity associated with this key.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the feature represented by the key.

attribute.name: validFrom
attribute.description: The date and time from which the key is valid.

attribute.name: expiration
attribute.description:
The key expiry date and time.
For perpetual keys, the value is NULL.

attribute.name: shared
attribute.description:
Indicates whether the key is shared among Managed Elements or dedicated to the Managed Element.
A key is dedicated to the Managed Element if the key can be used only by the Managed Element. This is always the case when the ELIM format is used. A key can be shared among multiple Managed Elements if it is installed on a License Server to which multiple Managed Elements connect.

attribute.name: keyId
attribute.description:
Identity of the feature under license control.
E.g., CXC4011234, FAT1021234

attribute.name: productType
attribute.description:
Identifier of the type of product to which the capacity is related.
This attribute is used only in systems where the different applications use separate key files to identify which application or product the capacity belongs to, e.g. “SASN”, “GSN_GGSN”, “SSR 8000”.

action.name: activate
action.description:
Initiates activation of the Emergency Unlock operational mode.
Return value is true if the activation succeeded, otherwise false.

attribute.name: emergencyUnlockId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: activationState
attribute.description: Activation state of Emergency Unlock.

attribute.name: expiration
attribute.description:
Expiry date and time of Emergency Unlock.
The value is NULL if the activation state is INACTIVE.

attribute.name: activationsLeft
attribute.description: Remaining allowed Emergency Unlock activations left.

action.name: activate
action.description:
Initiates activation of the Integration Unlock operational mode.
Return value is true if the activation succeeded, otherwise false.

attribute.name: integrationUnlockId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: activationState
attribute.description: Activation state of Integration Unlock.

attribute.name: expiration
attribute.description:
Expiry date and time of Integration Unlock.
The value is NULL if the activation state is INACTIVE.

attribute.name: activationsLeft
attribute.description: Remaining allowed Integration Unlock activations left.

attribute.name: autonomousModeId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: activationState
attribute.description: Autonomous Mode activation state.

attribute.name: expiration
attribute.description:
Expiry date and time of Autonomous Mode.
The value is NULL if the activation state is INACTIVE.

class.name: GracePeriod
class.description: Grace period information of the associated capacity.

attribute.name: gracePeriodId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: gracePeriodState
attribute.description: Grace period state of the capacity.

attribute.name: gracePeriodExpiration
attribute.description:
Expiry date and time of the grace period.
The value is NULL if grace-period state is inactive.

class.name: KeyFileManagement
class.description: Enables installation of key files and provides information about the installed key file.

action.name: installKeyFile
action.description:
Initiates the key file installation defined by the URI given as a parameter.
The return value is the action Id if the initiation succeeded, otherwise it is 0.
The installation is an asynchronous operation. Progress is reported via attribute reportProgress.

parameter.name: uri
parameter.description:
The URI of the key file that is to be installed.
The URI shall be a remote source file (for example sftp://myuser@myhostname.ericsson.local/dir/subdir/rbs006.xml).
If user name is needed to access the referenced file then the URI shall include the user name. The URI must not contain password.
The generic URI syntax is defined by RFC 3986.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description:
Password to access the referenced file.
If authentication is not password based, this parameter will be ignored.

action.disturbances: Installing a new key file may cause loss of traffic, if the required license keys are not included

attribute.name: keyFileManagementId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: reportProgress
attribute.description: Reference to the progress report including the result of the initiated key file installation.

class.name: KeyFileInformation
class.description: Basic information about the key file installed on the Managed Element.

attribute.name: keyFileInformationId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: sequenceNumber
attribute.description:
Sequence number of the key file.
If sequence number is not available, this value is 0.

attribute.name: installationTime
attribute.description: Date and time when key file was installed on the Managed Element.

attribute.name: locatable
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not the key file can currently be located.

attribute.name: productType
attribute.description:
Identifier of the product type to which the capacity is related.
This attribute is used only in systems where different applications use separate key files to identify to which application or product the capacity belongs, e.g: SASN, GSN_GGSN, or SSR 8000.

class.name: FeatureState
class.description: This MO class defines different licensing-related states of a feature.

attribute.name: featureStateId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: featureState
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not the feature license is administratively activated.
attribute.disturbances: Deactivating a feature may cause traffic loss

attribute.name: licenseState
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not a valid license key enables the feature usage.

attribute.name: serviceState
attribute.description:
Indicates whether or not the feature is able to provide its service from a license perspective.
The value of serviceState is derived from featureState and licenseState. If featureState is ACTIVATED and licenseState is ENABLED, serviceState is OPERABLE. In all other cases, serviceState is INOPERABLE.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: The description of the feature.

attribute.name: featureKey
attribute.description: Key instances associated with this feature.

attribute.name: keyId
attribute.description:
Identity of the feature under license control.
E.g., CXC4011234, FAT1021234

class.name: CapacityState
class.description: States of capacities that are supported by a Managed Element.

attribute.name: capacityStateId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: licenseState
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not a valid license key enables the capacity usage.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: The description of the capacity.

attribute.name: capacityKey
attribute.description: Key instances associated with this capacity.

attribute.name: keyId
attribute.description:
Identity of the feature under license control.
E.g., CXC4011234, FAT1021234

attribute.name: currentCapacityLimit
attribute.description: Licensed capacity limit as defined by the currently valid license key.

attribute.name: capacityUnit
attribute.description: The licensed capacity measuring unit.

attribute.name: grantedCapacityLevel
attribute.description:
The capacity level currently granted by the License Manager.
The attribute value is based on requests and releases of capacity units made by License Users. If such requests and releases are not made by License Users, the value of the attribute defaults to the licensed capacity limit. Note: The value of the attribute is not based on Performance Management data.

attribute.name: licensedCapacityLimitReached
attribute.description: Indicates whether or not current capacity usage reaches the licensed capacity limit.

attribute.name: featureState
attribute.description: Feature State for the new optional capacity licenses.

attribute.name: serviceState
attribute.description: Service State for the new optional capacity licenses.

relationship.name: CapacityKey_to_GracePeriod
relationship.statusInformation: GracePeriod should be associated to CapacityState.
